before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"3f3kk","text":"To start this procedure, you must have PCLS (Precision-Cut Lung Slices) ready (check protocol DOI dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.36wgq3xr5lk5/v1).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

creator.name: Nayra Cardenes
creator.affiliation: Divisioin of Pulmonary, Allergy, Critical Care and Sleep Medicine, School of Medicine, University of Pittsburgh

affiliations.affiliation: Divisioin of Pulmonary, Allergy, Critical Care and Sleep Medicine, School of Medicine, University of Pittsburgh

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"eimqu","text":"Precision-Cut Lung Slices (PCLS) are uniform, in size and thickness, tissue slices generated from human lungs that can be used for disease modeling, drug discovery and preclinical validation, while retaining the lung's cellular complexity and tissue architecture.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcd9q","text":"This protocol describes two different methods for the induction of cellular senescence by DNA damage in PCLS, and collection of samples for different analysis and measurements.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: TriState SenNET (Lung and Heart) Tissue Map and Atlas consortium - NIA

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"2t77c","text":"All steps involving human tissue must be conducted under BSL2 safety guidelines.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
image_attribution: {"blocks":[{"key":"cp2jo","text":"CLAR (Center for Lung Aging and Regeneration) Logo designed by Nayra Cardenes, PhD.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

{"blocks":[{"key":"57jbf","text":"Place one PCLS (1 cm diameter / 300 µm thick) per well with a brush.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77vic","text":"Change media for each condition:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5uog6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvq24","text":"Control - Change media (above).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dp1fl","text":"Bleomycin - 15 μg/ml Bleomycin in media above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"sbip","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bkvf5","text":"DMSO - 1:100,000 DMSO in media above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epqiu","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4uo0h","text":"Doxorubicin - 0.1 μM Doxorubicin in media above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqlje","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"2449028AA1E643FDAE0F3C51A469D726","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Bleomycin","rrid":"","sku":"10361","url":"http://products.fresenius-kabi.us/product-190.html","vendor":{"id":1341,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.fresenius-kabi.com/us/","name":"Fresenius Kabi"}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"152AC84B7EEA4274AEFBCEDA2D1BD979","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO)","rrid":"","sku":"D2438-50ML","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/US/en/product/sigma/d2438","vendor":{"id":17,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","name":"Merck MilliporeSigma (Sigma-Aldrich)"}}},"2":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"336A9EDE3AC24077A5EA62D5DE7F7CDE","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Doxorubicin hydrochloride","rrid":"","sku":"D1515-10MG","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/US/en/product/sigma/d1515","vendor":{"id":17,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","name":"Merck MilliporeSigma (Sigma-Aldrich)"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1n8u","text":"Treatment: change media with 1ml/PCLS, diluted in DMEM media + 0.1% FBS + 1% Pen/Strep + 1% Amphotericin B","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a02q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"64ij9","text":"Prior to media exchange, collect supernatant (s/n) from each condition in 1.5 mL tubes and, store at -80oC for future analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":104,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"h230","text":"Day 0 and 6:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63noi","text":"Snap freeze in liquid nitrogen: 4x PCLS per cryotube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54cpa","text":"Store at -80oC for future analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":12,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3lhd1","text":"Days 0 and 6:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvhj1","text":"Fix 2x PCLS with 1x fixative solution from β-galactosidase kit and stain for β-galactosidase as per manufacturer instructions.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":126,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"90lha","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"FEEF578C4098474CAB655976A97825B9","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Senescence β-Galactosidase Staining Kit","rrid":"","sku":"9860","url":"https://www.cellsignal.com/products/cellular-assay-kits/senescence-b-galactosidase-staining-kit/9860","vendor":{"id":10,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/cst_420.png","source":"/img/vendors/cst_420.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://www.cellsignal.com","name":"Cell Signaling Technology"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1a6ed","text":"Days 0 and 6:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cinjn","text":"Cell proliferation measurement: Use 2-3x PCLS to make 4x4 mm punches to perform WST-8 cell proliferation assay in a 96-well plate, following manufacturer's instructions.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":169,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"650f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"F4B451E643CA410BBEBD491436382980","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"WST-8 Assay Kit (Cell Proliferation)","rrid":"","sku":"ab65475","url":"https://www.abcam.com/products/assay-kits/wst-8-assay-kit-cell-proliferation-ab65475.html","vendor":{"id":22,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://www.abcam.com","name":"Abcam"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"193gu","text":"Days 0, 2,4 6: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1a27g","text":"Fix PCLS in 4% formaldehyde/PBS for 30 minutes (2x PCLS per condition).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7rp8","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ff1ll","text":"Then wash twice with PBS and store at 4oC in PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":39,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8na43","text":"Use 1-2 slices for paraffin embedding, and posterior histological analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqf0c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"A7B9C8A92EA84FE1A0AD5101B4C52611","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"16% Formaldehyde (w/v), Methanol free","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"28908","stats":{"total_protocols":1},"url":"http://","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://www.lifetechnologies.com","name":"Life Technologies"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"675uv","text":"Collect PCLS at Day 0, 2, 4 and Day 6 for different baseline and final timepoint measurements.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
